name: js-georaster-tools
description: Tools for drawing your raster files with JavaScript

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n rastertools -o build/jsrastertools.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/jsrastertools.js -c -m -o build/jsrastertools.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/jsrastertools.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/jsrastertools.js build/jsrastertools.min.js
